titleStmt.title: The pilgrimage of man, vvandering in a vvildernesse of vvoe wherein is shewed the calamities belonging to man being borne in this world, and how all the principall estates thereof are crossed with misery.
titleStmt.author: Johnson, Richard.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Johnson by STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
